text: Beers is a village in the province of North Brabant, the Netherlands. It is part of the municipality of Cuijk and is in the very northeastern part of the province, close to the Meuse River. As of 2016, about 1,700 people were living in Beers. Till 1994 Beers was also a municipality. Category:20th-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in North Brabant Category:Former municipalities of North Brabant Category:Land van Cuijk
title: Beers, North Brabant
